bill_title: exempt certain payments made by newspaper publishers to newspaper carriers from sales and use tax.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to exempt certain payments made by newspaper publishers to newspaper carriers from sales and use tax. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 10-45 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: There are exempted from the provisions of this chapter and from the tax imposed by it, payments made by newspaper publishers to newspaper carriers for the purpose of delivering and distributing free publications. Section 2. That chapter 10-46 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: There are exempted from the provisions of this chapter and from the tax imposed by it, payments made by newspaper publishers to newspaper carriers for the purpose of delivering and distributing free publications. 500 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
